situation: A commercial fishing boat uses sonar equipment to detect a school of fish 2 miles east of the boat and traveling in the direction of N 51˚ W at a rate of 8 mi/hr.

subquestions.question: If the boat travels at 20 mi/hr, approximate to the nearest 0.1˚ direction it should head to intercept the school of fish.
Find to the nearest minute the time will it take the boat to reach the fish
